contact.subtitle: We are here to listen and elevate your project to the next level.

home.subtitle: Creative agency and digital accompaniment.
home.heroSubtitle: We help creators and businesses professionalize their brand with creativity and AI innovation.

about.title: We don't just walk, we yump.
about.subtitle: In a crowded digital world, standing out requires momentum. Our mission is to be a springboard for creators and brands who want to reach higher.

elevation.title: Elevation
elevation.desc: We don't settle for standard. We always seek the next level of quality.

momentum.title: Momentum
momentum.desc: Inertia is the enemy of growth. We keep your brand in constant motion.

precision.title: Precision
precision.desc: AI-driven strategies, curated by humans. The perfect balance.

trampoleen.name: Trampoleen
trampoleen.desc: Trampoleen is a space for creation and collaboration where we support dynamic and committed people in their attempt to transform the world of content (or the world itself). We believe in the power of collective talent, driven by diversity, creativity, and action. Together we build projects that reflect a positive vision, where innovation and social change go hand in hand.
trampoleen.services: Brand identity, social media content management, and revenue impact through AI implementation.

sismaqua.name: Sismaqua
sismaqua.desc: Sismaqua is a leading company in water treatment, specialized in innovative solutions for purification and sustainable management of water resources. With a firm commitment to quality and the environment, Sismaqua offers cutting-edge technology to ensure clean and safe water in various industrial and municipal sectors.
sismaqua.services: Brand identity development: logo, typography, color palette, and style guide.

vinaris.name: Vinaris
vinaris.desc: Vinaris was born as a technological startup that seeks to bring small wineries closer to consumers, outside traditional commercial distribution networks. Our philosophy treats wine more as a living agricultural product than a commercial one, and therefore, we try to understand its typicity: the region it comes from, its variety, the vintage, the size of the vineyard, the type of cultivation, the yields... without forgetting the work in the winery, which must respect all of the above.
vinaris.services: Comprehensive support from the project's inception, brand identity, and communication strategy.

services.brandingSubtitle: Visual identity that leaves a mark.
services.socialSubtitle: Connecting your message with the world.

digital_accompaniment.title: Digital accompaniment
digital_accompaniment.desc: Growth strategy, content management, profile review, and personalized follow-up.

brand_image.title: Branding
brand_image.desc: Visual identity creation, color palettes, typography, logos, and style guides.

social_promotion.title: Social media promotion
social_promotion.desc: Campaign planning, publication management, and results analysis.

content_creation.title: Content creation
content_creation.desc: Photography, video, editing, creativity, and scriptwriting for social media.

ai_implementation.title: AI implementation
ai_implementation.desc: Process audit, automation proposals, and integration of AI tools.
